definition: environmental protection/environmentally friendly/abbr. for 環境保護|环境保护[huan2 jing4 bao3 hu4]
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Huan2 bao3 ju2

definition: (PRC) State Environmental Protection Administration (SEPA), former incarnation (until 2008) of 環境保護部|环境保护部[Huan2 jing4 Bao3 hu4 bu4]
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Huan2 bao3 Zong3 ju2

definition: an environmental activist/a fighter for environmental protection
"electrical junk center", site for re-processing of old electrical and electronic equipment

sentences.english: The economic development that the bank helped spur has unleashed a wave of environmental woes.
sentences.chinese: 亚银协助亚洲经济快速发展，引爆一波环保灾难。

sentences.english: Used thermosetting printing ink (environmental protection printing ink) all are harmless to the environment and the human body.
sentences.chinese: 我们的印唛烫画全部采用环保油墨，对人体无害。

sentences.english: The designing of laminating system is one of the key techniques in the designing of energy-saving and environment-protecting laminators.
sentences.chinese: 覆膜系统设计是设计环保节能型覆膜机的技术关键。

sentences.english: Certainly from a carbon footprint standpoint.
sentences.chinese: 从碳足迹的角度来看，扎啤当然是最环保的。

sentences.english: After forty minutes of interaction with the students, everyone says they are inspired to follow an eco-friendly way of life.
sentences.chinese: 四十分钟的互动下来，孩子们的环保心也跟著被启发。

sentences.english: The most stringent environmental protection measures in China's railway construction history have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 采取铁路建设史上最严格的环保措施。

sentences.english: No surprise, then, that motor manufacturers have been urging the EPA not to allow E15 on the forecourt.
sentences.chinese: 车商正催促环保局不要批准E15上市一点也不奇怪。

sentences.english: The promise of fuel cells for efficient, eco-friendly power generation has become a reality.
sentences.chinese: 承诺燃料电池的效率高，环保型发电已成为现实。

sentences.english: Enhance environmental awareness to build a beautiful park.
sentences.chinese: 提高环保意识，建设养好公园。

sentences.english: Emulsion paint is ' green coating , but its property of film forming is poor.
sentences.chinese: 乳胶漆是绿色环保涂料，但它成膜性较差。

sentences.english: It is also an eco-friendly car that protects the environment.
sentences.chinese: 它也是一种环保型汽车，保护环境。

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低烟无卤阻燃护套，环保。

sentences.english: Children's room wall stickers are the primary requirements of environmental protection, followed by the style.
sentences.chinese: 儿童房墙贴的首要要求就是环保，其次才是风格。

sentences.english: For no-frills environmental commitment, one cannot overlook Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 对于无虚饰环保运动，我们不能轻视佛蒙特州。

sentences.english: The ministry plans to adopt the new standards nationally by 2016.
sentences.chinese: 环保部表示，新标准拟于2016年全面实施。

sentences.english: Conservationists did not pay enough attention to human needs.
sentences.chinese: 环保人士对人的需求关注不够。

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
